content: Ahead of you is the base of some small falls where a few Croaky frog Guai are waiting among some Jade Lotus, and a green wisp with a few Will to grab at. Another wisp can be found below the opposite falls, by starting to head up the stone stairs on the side and looking left for a small canyon.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bamboo_Grove_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bamboo Grove Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Back Hills'.
The content is as follows:
Ahead of you is the base of some small falls where a few Croaky frog Guai are waiting among some Jade Lotus, and a green wisp with a few Will to grab at. Another wisp can be found below the opposite falls, by starting to head up the stone stairs on the side and looking left for a small canyon.
